channel.title: Records on Cherry Studio
channel.description: Recent content in Records on Cherry Studio

item.title: Camera/Audio
item.description: Camera/Audio # Use when you want to record your face and voice during recording. For first time use, browser will ask you for camera access. Please choose Allow on every visit

item.title: Media file
item.description: Media file # Use this to insert mp4 or mp3 media file.

item.title: Media file
item.description: Note # Insert note as annotation to give more information for your video. For e.g you may want to give a link or a text to describe the code

item.title: Remark
item.description: Remark # Use this to mark specific timestamps in video, similar to Youtube Chapter When play, audience will see like this:

item.title: Screen
item.description: Screen # Use this to record changes in your IDE Supported IDE # For now, only Vscode Preparation # download extension here install: code --install-extension cherry-vsc-recorder.vsix then follow the rest instruction Demo # https://youtu.be/8QC6vB-UNus

item.title: Screen
item.description: Screen # You can use this to capture the a browser, or any application running in your machine or entire screen. Note** Only can add maximum 3 screens at the same time. No restriction on how many screen in total during recording. For first time use, browser will ask you for camera access. Please choose Allow on every visit

item.title: Terminal
item.description: Terminal # Use this to record your terminal content Preparation # If you don’t have pipx installed, follow this guideline install cherryterm pipx install cherryterm verify installation: cherryterm version => Cherryterm version: 0.1.2 then follow the rest instruction Demo # https://youtu.be/8QC6vB-UNus
